values.text: command: timings, executor: "Mapi.timingsCommand", aliases: [lagg, tpsbar], description: "Отчёт нагрузки"
command: version, executor: "Mapi.versionCommand", aliases: [about], description: "Информация о модуле"
command: legacycommand, executor: "Mapi.legacycommandCommand", aliases: [legacycmd, lcmd], description: "Манипуляции со списком legacy-команд"
command: mi, executor: "Mapi.miCommand", description: "Работа с реестром модулей"
command: help, executor: "Mapi.helpCommand", description: "Помощь по командам"
type: Option, exception: "%var(Mapi.prefix)Использование: &7$scmd cmdprefix &e<префикс>", permission: whitelist
type: Int, name: page, optional: true
type: Option, permission: build_or_dev, exception: "%var(Mapi.prefix)Использование: &7$scmd help &e<категория>"
name: subCommand, equals: [add, remove, clear, list]
type: Option, maxArguments: 2, permission: dev, exception: "%var(Mapi.prefix)Использование: &7$scmd &b<add&7|&bremove&7|&bclear&7|&blist>"
